text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

For decades, people
have been treating

cancer in the same way,
giving patients toxic drugs

and radiation to try to kill
the cancer before the treatment
kills the patient.

But what if we could come up
with a new way to treat cancer?

What if we could teach patients'
immune systems to fight cancer
directly?

Our immune systems
work hard every day

to keep us healthy,
looking for and destroying

foreign invaders, like
viruses and bacteria, but also

normal cells that go rogue
and become cancerous.

However, cancer cells
are escape artists

and are great at escaping
the immune system.

To give our immune system
a helping hand using

cutting-edge science
in bioengineering

and nanotechnology,
DoriVac makes

billions of tiny personalized
biological wanted posters.

These are like vaccines that
can train our immune cells

to recognize and
destroy the cancer
cells throughout the body.

So we treated DoriVac in mice
with aggressive skin cancer

and saw impressive results where
80% of the mice were cured.

Even better, half a year after
that, this mouse immune system

recognized the cancer
and prevented them
from coming back.

At DoriVac, we believe
our secret weapon

to fight against the deadliest
cancer in the world lives
with us.

Will you join us in fighting
and helping the patients unleash
their immune systems?
Thank you.
[CHEERING AND APPLAUSE]
